title: World Weather: Local Weather Forecast | Rain Radar

creator: v-appz
descriptionHtml:
World Weather is the most accurate weather app for Android that enables you to easily keep track of real-time local weather temperature for more than 1,000,000 cities all around the world. When it comes to forecast weather,
you get to see the today's weather, hour-by-hour forecast for the next 24 hour as well as having access to an accurate 5 and 16-day weather forecast.

So, if you are into such weather forecast app and looking for a free and accurate local weather forecast app, download World Weather for free on your Android device and get real-time weather temperature forecast along with full weather report for any location all around the world.

Accurate weather forecast with live weather radars

World Weather, the free weather forecast app to keep track of current local temperature, comes with a clean and neat design and the interface is so user-friendly that makes you get to know the weather details of any desired location in a few seconds.
You can easily search through more than 1 million cities, add certain locations to your favorite list for quicker access, change the theme, share animated rain radar with other people and much more.

Worldwide rain radar: Have you ever wondered when the rain is about to approach to your current location? What are the rainy places in the world right now? Well, the worldwide rain radar feature enables you to get a reliable and accurate rain forecast for any location in the world.

Detailed and accurate weather forecasts: Other than the option to view the current temperature for a wide range of locations all around the world, you can also benefit from accessing 24-hour accurate weather forecast as well as a 5 and 16-day weather forecast.

Give this free weather app a try

Since the entire features of this weather forecast app to check the real-time local temperature, are available for free, there is no harm giving it a try and explore the features for yourself. Don’t forget to add your frequent cities in the favorite for quicker access in the future.

World Weather main features at a glance:

⭐ Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
⭐ More than 1 million cities to get local temperature, wind and precipitation
⭐ Reliable and accurate local weather forecast
⭐ Worldwide rain radar
⭐ Today's forecast, hour-by-hour forecast
⭐ Easy share weather forecast and rain radar with friends.
⭐ 5 day weather forecast
⭐ 16 day weather forecast
⭐ Real-time local temperature checker & live local weather
⭐ Access to more than 7,000 webcams all around the world
⭐ Bookmark favorite cities and locations
⭐ Nice temperature map using netatmo weather stations
⭐ 5 different theme colors

World Weather, the free weather app, delivers everything you should expect from such local forecasting apps and it even sets the bar higher by offering accurate weather forecasts, rain radar, access to 7,000+ webcams, customization options, and much more.

So, download World Weather for free on your Android phone or tablet, keep track of the local weather information as well as the accurate weather forecast for the next 5 days and have access to an accurate to worldwide rain radar.

Stay tuned and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests or any other suggestions.
